name: Simon
text: He is super creative and is genuinely a nice guy. Great to work with!

name: Kelly
text: Not only does he consistently create great work, he is one of the kindest and easiest to work with in the industry.

name: Jhon
text: Great photographer to work with. He was energetic, engaging, and a lot of fun! We love our wedding pictures!

name: Jennie
text: He is super creative and is genuinely a nice guy. Great to work with!

name: Jimin
text: He is an extremely personable individual, with an artistic eye, he will make your experience memorable!!

name: Rose
text: He has an amazing eye and is so easy to work with. Don’t pass up the chance to work with him!

name: Sasha
text: Not only does he consistently create great work, he is one of the kindest and easiest to work with in the industry.

name: Wilson
text: The best in the industry!! Always professional, fun, capturing our events to perfection!!

name: Rebecca
text: He was great. Made the photo part fun. My wife was happy with the photos which I’m glad about. He did a great job. Thanks!

name: David
text: He was very organized and respectful throughout the entire process. The quality and creativity of the photos are outstanding.

name: Jisso
text: He has the bubbly, sunshine personality that you want in a photographer

name: Lisa
text: He was so kind and patient working with my toddler and my less than cooperative newborn. The photos came out beautifully

name: Jimin
text: Needless to say, he captured everything (and more) and we are forever grateful!!!

name: Lisa
text: As soon as I got engaged, I knew that I wanted him to take our engagement photos. They turned out even better than I could have imagined

name: Rose
text: Not to mention he is very professional and was so much fun to work with. I’m so happy we have these beautiful photos to cherish forever!

name: Wilson
text: I am not sure how you sum up all the feels Joc and his work give you. Magic, maybe that is the best word.

name: Sasha
text: He is an amazing photographer. We had our engagement photos taken by her and we absolutely love all the images.

name: Simon
text: Needless to say, he captured everything (and more) and we are forever grateful!!!
